text: @senatemajldr We aren’t buying your BS. You should have forced trump to act on coronavirus. Now, we’ve all got plenty of time to watch the news and read, and we are seeing just how bad the @GOP is for America. @AmyMcGrathKY for Kentucky. #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica2020 #VoteByMail
